title: Motor racing-Formula One drivers' form sheet
text: April 11, 2018 / 9:04 AM / Updated 7 hours ago Motor racing-Formula One drivers' form sheet Reuters Staff 3 Min Read April 11 (Reuters) - Formula One drivers' form sheet ahead of Sunday's Chinese Grand Prix in Shanghai (listed in championship order and with the most recent races first): Number=race result, R=retired, DQ=disqualified, NS=did not start, NQ=did not qualify. 2018 2017 2016 BH AU/AE BR MX US JP MY SG IT BE HU GB AT AZ CA MC ES RU BH CN AU/AE BR Sebastian Vettel 1 1 3 1 4 2 R 4 R 3 2 1 7 2 4 4 1 2 2 1 2 1 3 5 Lewis Hamilton 3 2 2 4 9 1 1 2 1 1 1 4 1 4 5 1 7 1 4 2 1 2 1 1 Valtteri Bottas 2 8 1 2 2 5 4 5 3 2 5 3 2 1 2 2 4 R 1 3 6 3 R 11 Fernando Alonso 7 5 9 8 10 R 11 11 R 17 R 6 R R 9 16 -
